title: Deepika Padukone in a Ralph Lauren number at New York Fashion Week will leave you mesmerised! | Zee News
text:
Deepika Padukone in a Ralph Lauren number at New York Fashion Week will leave you mesmerised! By Ritika Handoo | Last Updated: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 12:05 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Gorgeous looking Deepika Padukone is having a ball in the international fashion circuit. The Bollywood beauty not only sat in the front row at the New York Fashion Week 2017 for renowned designer Michael Kors but also attended legendary Ralph Lauren's show. 
Yes! Deepika shared a picture of hers on Instagram while celebrity stylist Shaleena Nathani shared some clicks as well. The actress who recently made her Hollywood debut with 'xXx: Return of Xander Cage' opposite Vin Diesel left us mesmerised in an off white Ralph Lauren number. MUST READ 
Dippy darling wore a shimmery lace midi dress with fringes on the hem. She even pulled off a long off white overcoat with it and oh boy her make-up game was point on! 
Just like Priyanka Chopra, looks like Deepika too is nailing her fashion game internationally. 
You have to check out the pictures! Feb 16, 2017 at 8:57am PST Feb 16, 2017 at 5:32am PST Feb 16, 2017 at 5:33am PST Feb 16, 2017 at 6:04pm PST
